trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_000<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix is keeper of knowings and data! ...But Backrix has nothing to teach uplander this day!
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_010<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix is keeper of knowings and data. What does uplander wish to learn?
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_013<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix spends long hours scouring data for knowings of shiveryshakes three years ago. What does uplander wish to learn?
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_015<tab>Pssshkoh... Uplander trusts treasure hunter too readily. Be wary of her. Perhaps uplander wants to look more closely at data?

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_020<tab>Pssshkoh... Does Mide truly have feelings for hulking mass of metal? Uplander surely has more sense than that, and comes to learn truth through data.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_025<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix shares any and all knowings, if it helps uplanders stop Alexander. What data does uplander wish for today?

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_030<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix senses danger looming in future. Uplander is welcome to view any data <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var> thinks might help prevent it.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_035<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix does not know what to make of recent events. Look at data carefully, uplander, maybe there is something Backrix missed.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_040<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix is worried for Roundrox. What knowings does uplander seek today?
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_045<tab>Pssshkoh... Shanoa does not trade tongueflaps with Backrix. Did Backrix do something wrong?

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_050<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix sees Shanoa on top of whirlycog giant. This is different coeurlkitten, so Backrix names her “Schrödinger.” What does it mean? Backrix does not know.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_055<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix is easybreathing to know Roundrox is safe. Biggs keeps Roundrox's treasures safe.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_060<tab>Pssshkoh... Quickthinx is dangerous, will stop at nothing to crush uplanders. Uplander should be very, very careful.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_065<tab>Pssshkoh... Alexander may sleep, but mind of Backrix never rests. Must keep filling braincase with knowings, and pages of watcherbook with data!
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_070<tab>Pssshkoh... Pages of watcherbook are filled with data. Anything uplander would know, Backrix will be sharing!
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_Q1_000_100<tab>What will you ask?
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_101<tab>Tell me about yourself.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_102<tab>What kind of place is this?
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_110<tab>Watcherbook I-1.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_111<tab>Watcherbook I-2.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_112<tab>Watcherbook I-3.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_120<tab>Watcherbook II-1.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_121<tab>Watcherbook II-2.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_122<tab>Watcherbook II-3.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_140<tab>Watcherbook III-1.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_141<tab>Watcherbook III-2.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_142<tab>Watcherbook III-3.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_A1_000_200<tab>Nothing.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_300<tab>Uplander wishes to know background data of Backrix? Very well.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_301<tab>Backrix keeps eyes on Illuminati stronghold. But why is Backrix chosen, uplander will wonder.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_302<tab>It is by request of Slowfix. Many gobbies like tinkermaking tools and machinery. But Backrix has braincase like steel trap─catching all heard things, all seen things. So where Illuminati gather, there does watch of Backrix begin.
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_320<tab>Pssshkoh... Shortstop is where gobbies of Idyllshire keep watch, for Illuminati can never be trusted.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_321<tab>They have made a base inside giant of metal. It is old machine, left by uplanders of Sharlayan to rust. But with many hammerings Illuminati repair, and give it movement. Yes, it once stood!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_322<tab>But luck is on side of Idyllshire, and giant of metal failed. It came to a shuddering stop, and fell over into the lake. But if awakes again, then Idyllshire is ending─crushed under feet of iron!
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_500<tab>Pssshkoh... Give Backrix a moment... There, now uplander can read gobbie account.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_501<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Illuminati posed a threat to Idyllshire from their stronghold inside Sharlayan ruins. But when stronghold becomes a colossus of iron, and begins to climb out of river, then does gobbieflock turn to Scions for aid.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_502<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Nowtimes headgob of Illuminati is Quickthinx Allthoughts. He desires to make all knowings his own, takes ancient technologies at point of fighty-tool, and keeps secrets clenched tight in fist of iron.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_503<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Colossus of iron is no doubt Illuminati handiwork. Y'shtola says it feeds on aether, is draining hinterlands with much fastness. Land will be emptied if it stirs again.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_504<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But Illuminati magic barrier protects giant, and has since great shiveryshaking of ground three years past. Backrix thought Sharlayan ruins were freed from river bottom then, and came bobbing to surface.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_505<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But daughter of Slowfix says different. Roundrox claims that giant stood then, and ground quivered under its feet-thumping. Cid believes her, thinks that someone tried to summon primal and failed.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_506<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix knew of claim, but thought it was just imaginings. Roundrox is only little gobbie, after all. But she is proved right, and finds another with eyes for shiny junk and trinkets. Never has Backrix seen Roundrox so happy as when she is with uplander treasure hunter.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_520<tab>Pssshkoh... Here─all new facts of case, for you to see.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_521<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Cid asked Backrix to learn more of<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>. Data is sparse, but Backrix has confirmed it was written one hundred years ago by a genius machina-maker. It is brimful of plans and ideas, each as fantastic as the next.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_522<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Greatest among these are designs for a walking citadel, name of “Alexander.” It is designed as a utopia of learning, logic, and reason─part machina, part dream.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_523<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>The citadel would be open only to scholars and tinkerers with giant braincases. It could make its own water and food, and never need anything from outside itself. Thinkers could wander the realm, deepening their knowings, spreading their wisdoms, and building the perfect world.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_524<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix understands why some gobbies would have lustyeyes for this. Gobbieflock wander, never staying too long in one place and backstrapping precious things. Where better to live than home that walks?<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_525<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But making citadel real, this is frightful. Alexander Initiative is reason for Illuminati to be, and they use all their learnings and cunning to make it come true!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_526<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>And if they succeed, then colossus of iron will power itself through aether, and suck dry the lands. Inside could be safe, but outside everything dies. So gobbies and uplanders are of one mind─core of colossus must be destroyed.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_527<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>There is great peril even for grown uplanders, and Roundrox cannot join them. Daughter of Slowfix must stay behind, and has sad look to her. Maybe Backrix should take her junk hunting, like in past-times.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_540<tab>Pssshkoh... Uplander wishes for that record?

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_541<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Uplanders and gobbies have found a fragment of<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>. It is small piece of crystal that holds all plans and designs for Alexander, and is unlike any book Backrix has ever seen.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_542<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>It was hidden in plain sight very near Backrix─among collection of Roundrox. Daughter of Slowfix picked it up near Sharlayan ruins three years ago, and kept it here as her favorite treasure.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_543<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Fragment is dull, dark, but in hands of Roundrox it lights up. It shines strange patterns and symbols into the air above itself. Is it magic or lost science? Backrix has touched it several times, but it does not work for him.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_544<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Mide has read it, says it speaks of controlling spread of technologies. More advanced machina are dangerous, and their knowings should be held by chosen few. Otherwise, there is great risk of people misusing things they do not understand.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_545<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Mide claims it is so goodly thinkers can do good things, but Backrix has doubts about this. Good ideals often lead to bad places. Even if that were not so, Illuminati are not good. In seeing ideas made real, they will become self-righteous and go far, far astray.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_546<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Glowstone of Roundrox is only one part of codex, of course. Mide wishes to find the rest, can sell the ideas for great heaps of jinglyshine.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_547<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Illuminati still seek fragments, too, want to find all of <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>. But they call favorite treasure of Roundrox the missing piece, and Backrix wonders─is there another reason they want the child's glowstone?<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_600<tab>Pssshkoh... Uplander wishes to read Watcherbook II-1? Very well!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_601<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Illuminati have revived yet another part of Alexander. Backrix wonders how many crystals they used this time.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_602<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>With reports of Illuminati sighted going in and out of Alexander, backstrapped with supplies and explosives, many feared imminent assault. However, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> strode into Alexander, and put a stop to their plans.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_603<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Although uplander's attack was a great success, there was little time for celebration. Quickthinx Allthoughts barged into Bigwest Shortstop and claimed Mide willingly handed over last piece of <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> to them.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_604<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Quickthinx says Mide has worked with Illuminati since past-times. Backrix hesitates to believe him, but recent findings show there may be truth to his words. Backrix suspects Mide is survivor of Auri expedition that failed to summon Alexander three years ago.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_605<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>More interesting knowings are contained in rare Sharlayan book Backrix borrows from Y'shtola. It seems master technologist who authored <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> was Au Ra, and that the ideals set forth in book have been passed down through generations.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_606<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Utopia that moves is fitting contrivance for a people who have spent generations wandering. Backrix is not surprised that an invention of nomadic Xaela holds such appeal for gobbies, who spend most of their lives with all possessions backstrapped to selves.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_607<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Although author did not sign their name, they spent their youth studying in Sharlayan, developing and fostering their ideas. According to the text's descriptions, Mide shares some physical characteristics of this scholar, namely the same blue hair. If Backrix's guessing is correct, then she could be a descendant of author, and perhaps she has inherited ideals of <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_620<tab>Pssshkoh... So this is data that uplander wishes to read? Very well, Backrix will prepare it.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_621<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Illuminati have captured Roundrox. She is one of few who are privileged with ability to read <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>, and no doubt Illuminati plan to use her in their scheme to awaken Alexander.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_622<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Mide revealed to us that the <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> is more than just a collection of texts. It can also be used to control metal titan. Backrix finds it strange that Roundrox has such unique talent. Perhaps her passion for finding abandoned machina has something to do with it.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_623<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix does not know if it was lucky that Roundrox was one to pick up stone three years ago. Stone was piece of shattered codex that remained after Mide's failure. If Illuminati had been able to find all pieces of fragments then, perhaps they would have already drained the land of aether.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_624<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Mide has charted the primal and her data indicates it is divided into three major parts: Gordias, the right arm; Midas, the left arm; and Alexander, the body. Mide is certain Roundrox is held prisoner in body, which Illuminati have sealed off, making rescue impossible.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_625<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But uplanders devise strategy to disable core of Midas. If the primal is immobile, then Roundrox will be safe for some time. She is too important for Illuminati to harm.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_626<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>However, although Mide's efforts have proven valuable, Backrix cannot trust her completely. She clings to belief that a man she loved three years ago is trapped within core, and wishes to meet him again.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_627<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>She even went so far as to summon a primal, in hopes to be united with her beloved. Backrix does not call himself expert on uplanders, but he does not think those actions befit someone sane. One thing Backrix does know, however, is that Mide is sincere in her desire to rescue Roundrox.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_640<tab>Pssshkoh... Which watcherbook does uplander wish to read? Ah, Watcherbook II-3? Give Backrix some time to prepare it... Here!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_641<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix can barely believe recent happenings and revelations. Through some mysterious means, Alexander can interfere with time's flow. Backrix has never heard of such a thing, but admits it could explain some puzzling occurrences.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_642<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Aether was pouring from halted cores of Alexander, but Cid observed the flow reversing, almost as if time itself had been turned backwards.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_643<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Upon hearing this, Backrix recalled when uplanders left to find core of Midas. They returned almost immediately after departing. It was then Backrix knew that something was not right within magic barrier.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_644<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Even Y'shtola sensed an irregular energy from within barrier some time ago. Perhaps appearance of Alexander is to blame for that.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_645<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Odd nature of barrier is not only worry. At every step, Illuminati seem to know what will happen next. Quickthinx knew Mide's fragment was fake, and saw through Biggs and Wedge's efforts to deceive him.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_646<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Perhaps Quickthinx is not such an addlebrain, but there is no explanation for abrupt loss of power to Mide's platform. Quickthinx stopped directly under Mide, and waited patiently for fragment to drop into his hands. To suggest Quickthinx somehow planned that series of events is complete unsense.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_647<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>If Illuminati can bend time within barrier, they can reactivate cores without consuming heaps of crystals. An enemy with such capabilities cannot be felled with blades alone.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_648<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>From cliffs overlooking Thaliak, Alexander appears almost peaceful. But Backrix knows inside cold steel frame, two cores burn with life.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_649<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>If Illuminati manage to restore power of all three cores, then there is no hope. Backrix fears that true extent of Alexander's powers is still shrouded in mystery. If the primal's grasp over time becomes even stronger, Illuminati could change future and past according to their twisted ideals, shaping history to their will.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_650<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix gains some reassurance, at least, that its influence over time seems limited to space within barrier. Backrix hopes that uplanders can manage to keep it that way.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_651<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But with last piece of <var 1A 01 /var>Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> in their possession, and Roundrox to read it, Illuminati have all they need to control Alexander. Backrix senses danger ahead, and hopes gobbies and uplanders alike can get through it safely.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_700<tab>Pssshkoh... Uplander would be reading Watcherbook III-1? Read well, for great knowings are written within!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_701<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Backrix can little believe recent hearings. According to tongueflaps of Illuminati agent, if third core is activated, Alexander will gain power to travel through time and changewrite history.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_702<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>And there is more! Quickthinx is said to be allseer from comingtimes, where Illuminati rule over world with iron fist. Backrix and uplanders are already doomed to failure, Illuminati agent says. Backrix does not want to believe, but does explain why Quickthinx can beforesee doings of uplanders.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_703<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>If Illuminati tongueflaps are true, the day Alexander spreads timewings and Illuminati usher in new world─Illuminati call<var 1A 01 /var> truetimes<var 1A 02 /var>─is near.

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_704<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>It is clearknown that there is only one way to keep world from falling into evil hands of Illuminati─stop Quickthinx from powerstarting final core. Fortunately for gobbieflock, Cid has plan. Uplanders will turn off lightwall, enter Alexander, and backtake Roundrox, keep pasttimes and futuretimes safe from Illuminati control.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_705<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But lightwall around Alexander does not just keep inbreakers out, it keeps Alexander in. This is because it is same one craftmade three years ago by Mide and friends, when they summon great colossus with ancient treasure.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_706<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Treasure is strange horn with metal tip that Y'shtola was searching for many years ago. Horn is relic downhanded by ancient society of uplanders with big braincases, has power to control aether. Horn has frightening power, must be sealed away for good of uplanders and gobbies, says Mide.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_707<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>One more thing gets stuck in Backrix's braincase. Quickthinx's little friend, Shanoa, is known to Backrix. Three years ago, Roundrox was telling Backrix about little black coeurlkitten she eyecatches after finding glowstone.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_708<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Now, coeurlkitten comes to Shortstop, teachwarning uplanders about Illuminati agent. Uplanders are thinking it is Shanoa, but Backrix knows different─Backrix sees Shanoa on colossus highplace with Quickthinx. Backrix gives new kitten new name─Schrödinger. What does name mean? Backrix just likes sound.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_720<tab>Pssshkoh... Uplander is in need of knowings? Make much room in braincase, for Watcherbook III-2 is overfull of tasty data!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_721<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>We learn that Illuminati keep<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> deep in Alexander, in central command room. Uplanders find floatyboard going there, and Backrix goes with them to make inbreak and rescue Roundrox.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_722<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>In central control room, tongueflaps of Mide touch Roundrox, and Roundrox uses full power of Alexander spread timewings and travel three years in pasttimes! Backrix sees Mide and friends summon giant with own eyes!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_723<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Suddenly, there are shiveryshakes, and someone backtakes control of Alexander. From highwatch atop colossus, Backrix watches Mide's companions die, and lover get sucked by whirlywinds into core─same sight Mide is seeing three years ago.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_724<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Steel giant seen by Roundrox three years ago was not Alexander summoned by blue-haired uplanders, but Alexander summoned by Illuminati three years later, backmoving in time! Did Quickthinx have these knowings all along...?<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_725<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Here, writings of watcherbook end once. Schrödinger bumps into Backrix atop Alexander, sending both watcherbook and self flyfalling to ground. Writings from here are added by Backrix after watcherbook is retrieved much later.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_726<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Watcherbook is found by Quickthinx, giving him knowings of three years in future. Quickthinx names himself futureseer, predict happenings not yet happened from pages of Watcherbook.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_727<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Quickthinx also finds Schrödinger, and gives new name of Shanoa. In sametimes, Mide gets wild idea in braincase that heartmate is still alive in core of colossus. Mide makes tongueflaps with Quickthinx, passing along knowings of how to summon Alexander.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_728<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Is Quickthinx power-hungry phonyfaker, using Backrix's watcherbook to trick uplanders and gobbies? Does Quickthinx truly believe, in heart of hearts, that he is futureseer and savior of gobbiekind? For all of Backrix's knowings, this is mystery even to Backrix.<var 1A 01 /var>
TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIX_000_740<tab>Pssshkoh... Backrix hopes uplander has big braincase. Knowings written in Watcherbook III-3 are most mind-booming of all!

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_741<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Truth of Quickthinx is revealed! Quickthinx has betterbuilt own body, is more machine than gobbie. More than this, Quickthinx was sneakyhiding own power to read<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>! Quickthinx tries to use codex to travel back in time, but Alexander refuses, sending surgebolt to destroy codex and offpower Quickthinx. Without codex, there are many shiveryshakes and core runs out of control!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_742<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Suddenly come backwords from lightscreen. Backrix's braincase is blown─soul of Mide's heartmate is inside machine, just as Mide is believing all along!<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_743<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>Full knowings are too much for even Backrix's braincase, but Cid tells to Backrix that deep inside Alexander is powerful device with power to numbercrunch infinite possibilities, and mockmake images of time-space.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_744<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>According to Cid, it is not unpossible that in this space could be memories of uplander soul, and that even whirlycog giant itself could have mind of its own─like a god inside machine.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_745<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>If this is true, then maybe souls of Mide and Dayan backmeet inside core, and heartmates are together again in prison of alltimes, cut off from all of time and space.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_746<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>But prison maybe is not lonely place. Mide is once saying she wanted to walk to ends of the world with her heartmate. Maybe somewhere, deep inside heart of whirlycog giant, her wish is truecoming.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_747<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>After escaping from Alexander and returning to Shortstop, Backrix is handed Sharlayan legendbook, present from Y'shtola. Book tells of faerielegend of Hotgo people, blue-haired uplanders who believe they are born from boy and girl who come from steel giant in earlytimes. Names of two children are Mide and Dayan.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_748<tab>(-Watcherbook-)<var 1A 02 /var>After sealing away Alexander's core and seed of destruction, were two uplanders sent to past by god in machine to be reborn as children, growing to be father and mother of new people? If so, one question sticks in Backrix's braincase.<var 1A 01 /var>

TEXT_REGDRA2BIGWESTSHORTSTOP_00286_BACKRIXREPORT_000_749<tab><var 1A 02 /var>Alexander is born from ideals recorded in<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var>. But tribe of people uplanders who created<var 1A 01 /var> Enigma Codex<var 1A 02 /var> are born from Alexander. How this is possible is not clear to Backrix. Backrix will be racking braincase over this one for longtimes...<var 1A 01 /var>
